p.hi:
Subscripti fuerunt facti Burgenses et confratres Gilde huius Burgi
tempore Prepositure Willelmi Scherar' Anno Domini et cetera xlvijmo

div.p: David meignes Receptus fuit Racione paterne libertatis pro v s'
Robertus Sellar' Receptus fuit Racione paterne libertatis pro v s' plegio
Magister thomas Edname receptus fuit ex gracia consilij pro v s'
Magister gilbertus forestar' receptus fuit ex gracia consilij et cetera
thomas sanchar' receptus fuit ob fauorem eiusdem magistri gilbertj
Alexander patonson' receptus fuit ex gracia consilij pro xl s' plegio Johanne Dauyson' glaslach
Robertus lauson' et Willelmus lauson' Recepti fuerunt Racione paterne libertatis pro x s'

Robertus sillir' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde ex gracia consilij
ex eo quod disponsauit filiam quondam Alexandri stane pro xx s' plegio matheo fichet

Johannes mernach receptus fuit in confratrem gilde pro xl s' ad instanciam gilberti megneis
plegio pro sua vicinitate et cetera
Burgenses tantum
Andreas marr' receptus fuit in simplicem comburgensem ad instanciam Roberti Wan' caritative
Thomas gray receptus fuit in simplicem burgensem ad instanciam Ricardus de Ruthirfurde pro xx s'
Thomas Duncani receptus fuit in burgensem Racione patris quia pater eius burgensis erat pro v s'

Johannes valandy receptus fuit in simplicem burgensem ad instanciam Thome de Kyntor et
Edmundi lousone' pro xv s' plegius Edmundus louson'
Thomas lorymar' Receptus fuit in burgensem simplicem pro xx s'
henricus Walkar receptus fuit in simplicem burgensem pro xx s' plegio Johanne blak
Willelmus flisch' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum ad instanciam W prepositj

Alexander co Coupar receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum ex eo quod disponsauit filiam bricij
Duncaneson'
Willelmus Cumyn receptus fuit in simplicem burgensem pro xiij s' iiij d' plegio Johanne buchan'
Alexander scherrar' Receptus fuit in simplicem burgensem pro xiij s' iiij d' plegius dominus Johannes pettinvyn
JohannesThis whole entry may have been deleted. Alexandri pistor receptus fuit in simplicem burgensem pro xiij s' iiij d' plegius gilbertus vaus
Johannes henrisone de Cardeny Receptus fuit in simplicem burgensem pro xiij s' iiij d'

Adame Roberti Receptus fuit in Confratrem gilde ex gracia consilii ex eo pro dispon
sauit filiam Nicholaii lorymar pro v s'

Andreas Kay Receptus fuit in Confratrem gilde ex gracia Consilii ex eo quod disponsauit
filiam Symonis blabre pro v s'

Johannes Alexandri Receptus in Confratrem gilde ex gracia Consilii ad instanciam
Andree meigneis pro v s'
Johannes baxtar' Receptus fuit in Confratrem gilde pro xxvj s' viij d' plegio Johannes scrog'

Jacobus de suthirlande Receptus in confratrem gilde ex eo quod disponsauit filiam
Thome Club pro xl s' plegio Thomas Clube

The xj dai of Decembre / The yher' of grace et cetera xlvij the hale Counsaile
that is to say / Gilbert meignes John fife Richard Ruthirfurd' John scrogs pater
John marr' / Dauid Ruthirfurd' alexander Kintor Duncane clat thom craufurd'
Androu ayncroft John gray John voket / macolme forbes / matheu fichet
John Kintor patrik badenach' Richard Kintor thom Kintor Dauid meignes
Richard stephinson' and Willelmus Rolland' / a avisitly with' a consent grauntit
licence and fredome to John' the vaus burges of this burgh' for his
gude meritis done in tyme bigane / to assigne the fischeyng of the
half net of the Raake the quhilk is set til him / to quhat frende of
his that be speidful thocht til him / except lordis / enduryng al
the tyme of the assedacion made til him

Curia gilde huius burgi tenta per W scherar' prepositum xijmo die Januarii Anno
Domini et cetera xlvijmo

Quo die thomas maliceson' conuictus et per confessionem propriam de forisstallacione'
de pellium / correorum et foris Regratacione denariatorum
Eodem die Ricardus hill conuictus fuit de foristallacione pellium et correorum
Item Johannes Andirson' conuictus fuit de foristallacione communi lane pellium et correorum

p.add:
Memorandum de Ja sathlee'
et de Jok sathlee'

div.p:
Item eodem die comparuit in Curia Johannes filius et heres quondam Willelmum Cowtis et pecijt
cum instancia doceri et assignari vt moris est ad terram que fuit quondam eiusdem Willelmi
patris sui / Et ideo ex decreto curie iniunctum fuit Johanni gray vno ballivorum huius burgi
quod vadat ad et cognoscat dictum Johannem ad quandam terram Jacens in ly grene
inter terram hered' quondam Johannis philipson' ex parte boreali et ter communem venellam
ex parte australi / et ly hur'wynde versus occidens et equeductum versus
oriens et cetera

The fift day of februar' Anno domini et cetera xlvijmo / Androu tulidef comperit
persounaly befor the Aldirman and mony of the brethir' of the gilde of this
burgh' / and anence the thirdpart of a net of the pot the quhilke he
had of the toune / he declarit that quhat tyme that the Aldirman
that was in the tyme gave him his gressome agayne he resignyt in
his hand the said thirdpart

xvto die februarij Anno Domini supradicto / Commune consilium Recognouit quod alias ad
instanciam et Requestum domini abbatis de Arbrothoc / propter diuersos fauores eiusdem
factos Communitatj huius burgi / concessit dimidiam partem Rethis aque de ly
furdis qui fuit alias assedata quondam Dauid clerk / pro eisdem terminis pro quilibet
fuit assedata eidem

Item eodem die consilium ordinauit et decreuit quod Andreas tulidef satisfaciet
pro dimidia parte aque de ly Raak quam habet ad requestam domini de gordoune
talem grissomam qualem alij vicinj soluunt non obstante summa quam dedit
domino de gordoun' prefato

Item eo the sammyn dai Androu tulidef be the grete ath' the quhilk he had
sworne deponit anence the thirdpart of the net of the pot the quhilke
he had before / that he heght' to the aldirman than John' of fife / that
he suld resigne to patrik of fife that thirdpart / and he gave it
owre our' til the sammyn patrik / that tyme that he gat consent of the
lord of gordoune to the half net of the Raake

Duncane of clat and John' of scrogs filius be thair' athes deponit the
sammyn in al thing .

presentes in hoc consilio Ricardus Ruthirfurd' Dauid Ruthirfurd' Johannes fife
Johannes marr' Stephanus Johnson' John' gray Johannes scrogs pater thomas
blyndseil Andreas ayncroft alexander Kintor patricius badenach' Johannes scrogs
filius Willelmus Rolland' Johannes howyson' Walterus giffard' Willelmus cadiou
Simon blabre Duncanus clat Andreas tulidef / John' Kintor

The viii day of Aprile the yher' of grace a thousande et cetera xlviii the Aldirman
and ballieis set to Dauid Kymdy the Westmast buth vndir the tolbuth safande
ane for a yher' for a merk of male

Quinto die mensis Aprilis Anno Domini et cetera quadragesimo octauo the quhilk day
Williame scherar Aldirmane Jhone of scrogs the fadir Mastir Thomas Edname
Androu Tulydef Jhon' Wode Duncane of Clat stevin Jhonson Androw Ancroft
patryk of badrenach Wat giffarde Malcolme of forbes Jhon' gray Jhone' voket
Thome of Kyntor' Thom blindsele Jhon blak Jhone howyson Symon blabre Jhon'
henrisone Culane Jamez blyndsele Jhon' galt Will Rollande Alexander Cryne
Thome of stane Alexander blyndsele Will malisone Robert barovn' Wat pyot
Robert pratt Thom Andirsone Jhone' of Tulydeff Jhone' Nachty . Androw
childe Duncan of lundoris Duncane Alans Alown' Will peterkyne Androu
panyter' Will Andirsone' Alexander Rollande William of Cadiou Will symson
Will fichet Androw sprunt // Jhone of spens Will atkynsone paton' pyot
and malcom' Dacr' seriandis Mathow fichet Jhon' of loudon' geoffray barnat
Will Jhone' hervy .

xvijmo die mensis Maij Anno supradicto Commune consilium huius burgi instante Andrea
Alaneson' et considerata promissione facta eidem andree ab antea concessit
eidem andree alaneson' piscariam dimidij rethis de ly pot aque de Dee
quam g possidebat quondam agnes branche / in casu quod dicta piscaria
inuenietur vacans per illos xij de duodecim qui fecerunt dictam assedacionem

Item eodem die decretum fuit per idem consilium quod marioria relicta quondam Roberti
Sellar' gaudebit assedacione bolle aque usque terminum beati martinj proximo futuro
et p inveniet sufficientem seruitorem ad ministrandum in officio / et debit plegio
pro firma

The firste dai of Julij the yher' of grace jM CCCC xlviij the commoune
Counsaile has concludit and grauntit to mak a propyne to our' souerane
lord the kingis Welcum / quhilk is now tocum / of twa tunnes of gascoene
wyne / sex lichtis of iij stane of wax // and xij half pundis of scorchetis
or falyheand thar'of xij hale pundis

xxjmo die Julij Anno Domini et cetera xlviijo subscripti electi fuerunt ad considerandum
summas Recuperabiles et non recuperabiles de summis debitis de restancia antique
financie et cetera
Johannes de fife
Johannes scrogs
gilbertus meignes
Johannes Duncanus clat
Johannes de marr'
Matheus fichet
patricius badenach'

The xvj dai of August the yher' forsaid the Counsaile has fundin and ordanit
that sen it is clerly knawin to thaim that Androw benyng tuke fra Adam of
benyng a certane of bernwallis siluer / that his land and gudis sal freith' the
toune of ij hamburgh barell' of salmond' and xij s' vj d' of siluer that remanys
vnpaijt

It was ordanit be the Aldirmane and the Covnsale the xxvij day of September'
that Robert of gillaspy suld cum to the tolbuth of the samyn burgh the fryday
next eftir to do law and Justice to ser Richard Atkynsone chaplane for the
annuale of a croft the quhilk the said Robert occupijs and to mak full contentacion'
in alsfer' as he has occupiit

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem octauo
die mensis maij anno Domini et cetera lxixno /

The samyn day the actione of forthoucht felny put to William of lammynton and til his
son' be robert quhitson' the decyding of it contenutt to the morn' eftir the trinite day
next to cum and richt sua of breking of borowys

the distrubling and disobeyingof the balye Johne' of Kintor and for distrublung of William of lammynton
and his son' and breking of borowis on thaim contenuit is in like wys' to the samyn day done'
be Robert of abirdour' to thaim and the saide Robert has fundyn William blyndsell lawborch'
that the saide William of lammynton' and his son' and thair' parties be onscathit of him' bot as curs'
of common law will'

Item Robert quhitson' has fundin adam of crauffurde and William andirson' law borowys
that William of lammynton and his son' and thair' inherdance be on scathit of tham him
bot as curs' of common law will and on the samyn wis' William of lammynton' and
his son' has fundyn Richart of Kyntor and gilbert of Kyntor law borowyis that
Robert quhitson' and Robert of abirdour' and thair' inherdance be on scathit of thaim bot
as curs' of common law will'

It is giffin to Jamys craike to preff on the morne' eftir the trinite day that the
some' of vj li' xj s' ix d' ob' clamyt be henry of culan be payit til him he is
quyt and gif he failyeis of his preff he sal content the said' henry the said'
some'

the samyn day Johne' alexanderson' in amercyment of this curt for the wrangwis'
distrubling of Johne' Walkar' and his seruandis and til amend til him as law
will'

Curia gilde burgi de Aberdene tenta in tempore prepositure Johannis de fif
per Duncanum de Clat decanum gilde die quarto mensis octobris Anno Domini
millesimo quadringentesimo quadragesimo octauo
Quo die subscripti electi erant in Communes Consiliarios huius burgi

The assis' chosin to serve the Justice
John' of fife
Jhon' of scrogs pater
gilbert meigneis
Jhon' of marr'
Androu AncroftThe above four names are bracketed together .
Robert blyndsele
Will Rolande
Will voket
John' henrison culanThe above four names are bracketed together.
Thom blyndsele
Alexander of Kyntor'
John' of scrogis filius
Mathow fichetThe above four names are bracketed together.
Jhon' scherrar Dunbanan
Thom Nicolson'
Robert gillaspyThe above three names are bracketed together,
John Kymdy
John Kyntor
William scherrar'
Jhon' gray
John' howyson
Stevin Jonson'The above four names are bracketed together.
Androw Alanson'
Malcolme of forbes
Alexander of Douglace
Wat giffard
Thom' Kyntor
patricius de fife
Robert chamer
Richard of chamer
Willelmus cadiou

This is the appoyntment betuex Alexander of Wardlaw Androw pulty John' Joffraison'
Stephanus huntar' and John' Duncaneson' / takaris of the certane men plegis of quhitby
hertilpule on that a part and John' stephinson' burges of this burgh' on that othir' part
that is to say that John' stephinson' is obliste be the faith' of his bodi to do his
lele diligence to keip the said plegis / for quhais costis and kepyng he sal
haue euery dai v s' schillingis of vsuale monee of Scotland / fra the dai
of thair' entre on to the tyme of thair' passage / the quhilk monee salbe
paijt to the said John' of the crafte siluer and gold that cummys of the said
plegis / and or he part with' thaim owte of his hous' // And the said John'
stephinson' has na perile na aventur' of thair' kepyng bot to do his lele
diligence as is forsaid / And at he sal noght' deliuer thaim bot of charge
and consent of al the forsaid men or thair' procuratouris / Attour' thai
haue promissit to l the said John' a Reward for his kepyng and labour'
to be modifijt be John' of fif Aldirman and gilbert meignes burges of ab
this burgh'

The xiij day of Decembre the yher' of grace jM iiijC xlviij the counsaile has ordanit
that Dauid lichton' haue his fee of xviij markis / swa that he cum ilke halidai
to the howris and ilke day to the ladymes' vndir the payne of fo iiij d'
for ilke howr'

Item the counsaile has grauntit to Dauid Kemedy a buth' vndir the tolbuth' fra
hyne to quhissondai free / for his seruice in the kirk

Item the counsaile has concludit that thai will noght' continow to maistir androw
Croudane na fee / bot give he makis gude seruice it salbe considerit be the
Aldirman and the Counsaile . to Reward him .

Item the counsaile has continowit to ser James fraser and ser Androw thomson' thair'
feis of the kirk seruice / on to quhissondai next tocum / al anerly and fra thyne
the toune salbe free / to fee quhom thai like et cetera

Item the half wattir boll' vacand be the distress' of Robert of Sellar' / salbe reseruit
in the handis of the dene of the gilde / on to the tyme that the counsaile
be bettir avisit how thai will dispone apon it

div.head: presentes in Consilio
div.p:
Gilbert meignes Johannes scrogs / Stephanus Johnson' Alexander Kintor matheus fichet Andreas
ayncroft Walterus Giffard Adam nicholson' Simon blabre / Johannes blak / Robertus gillespy
Willelmus Rolland / murthacus glastre Dauid Ruthirfurd' / Willelmus scherar' Johannes
voket et Ricardus Kintor / cum preposito / decano gilde et balliuis

Item penes feodum abbatis de bone accorde / consilium ordinauit / quod prepositus in cuius
tempore electus fuit satisfaciet sibi feodum suum / secundum consideracionem consilij
